subject: Introduce special discounts for all our customers
body:
Dear customer.
Do you shop for medications on the Web? You do? But do you know that 70% of Web-shoppers are regularly being sold fake medications? Protect yourself now choose a reliable online pharmacy.
Our advice for everyone shopping for medications on the Web is to cling to reliable licensed pharmacies that have been operating on the Internet market for quite a long time already (such as CanadianPharmacy) Want to save on drugs? Try CanadianPharmacy - #1 discount Canadian pharmacy.
Don't put your health and the health of your relatives in danger choose CanadianPharmacy.
Yours faithfully,Rachael Rossi
